about_the_game: A (not very) long time ago, there was a game named Duck Simulator 2. But of course, everybody's first question was "where on earth can I get this absolutely stunning soundtrack, preferably for free?" This soundtrack is the response to that very question, including all the songs from the campaign (plus some bonuses)!
detailed_description: A (not very) long time ago, there was a game named Duck Simulator 2. But of course, everybody's first question was "where on earth can I get this absolutely stunning soundtrack, preferably for free?" This soundtrack is the response to that very question, including all the songs from the campaign (plus some bonuses)!
name: Duck Simulator 2 Soundtrack
short_description: The genre-defying phenomenon's soundtrack that will leave you speechless!
